== Description ==

This [[Conditional Tags|Conditional Tag]] checks if any registered [[Sidebars|sidebar]] has active widgets.

== Usage ==

%%% <?php is_dynamic_sidebar(); ?> %%%

== Parameters ==

This tag does not accept any parameters. 

==Return Values==

; <tt>(boolean)</tt> : <tt>true</tt> if any registered sidebar contains a widget; otherwise <tt>false</tt>.
